public class DanM7
{
    public const string eduCollege = "University of Connecticut";
    public const string eduMajor = "Computer Science & Engineering";
    public const string eduMinor = "Mathematics";
    public string profession;
    public string favLang;
    public string hobby1;
    public string hobby2;
    private string hobby3;

    public DanM7()
    {
        profession = "Lead Programmer Analyst";
        favLang = "C#";
        hobby1 = "Platform Games";
        hobby2 = "Baseball";
        hobby3 = "Vampire Diaries";
    }

    public string TalkSports(DateTime? dateCurrent)
    {
        return (dateCurrent == null) ? "How 'bout those Red Sox?" :
            (dateCurrent.Month == 3) ? "U! C! O! N! N!" :
            (dateCurrent.Month < 3 || dateCurrent.Month > 8) ? "Pat's year!" :
            "18 for Celtics huh??";
    }

    public string TalkMusic(string bandFavorite)
    {
         return (bandFavorite == null || bandFavorite != "Led Zeppelin") ? "Fool." : 
             "That's right!";
    }
